bibl.title: Archaeological Sources for the Earliest Churches in Alexandria.
bibl.note: 18 archaeological sites and about a hundred objects which can be ascribed to the remains of churches (4th-7th cent.).

bibl.title: Coptic Studies. Acts of the Third International Congress of Coptic Studies. Warsaw, 20-25 August, 1984

bibl.seg: TKACZOW Barbara, Archaeological Sources for the Earliest Churches in Alexandria.
Coptic Studies. Acts of the Third International Congress of Coptic Studies. Warsaw, 20-25 August, 1984 (Varsovie, 1990) pp. 431-435, 1 plan.
18 archaeological sites and about a hundred objects which can be ascribed to the remains of churches (4th-7th cent.).
